items.question: How does archetype revelation work?
items.answer: Our unique system analyzes your responses to identify your main archetype among 54 possibilities, based on research in psychology and symbolism.

items.question: How long does the process take?
items.answer: The complete revelation takes about 15-20 minutes, including the questionnaire and personalized analysis of your archetype.

items.question: Can I retake the test?
items.answer: Yes, you can repeat the experience after 30 days, as we evolve and our dominant archetype may change over time.

items.question: Are the results reliable?
items.answer: Our archetypes are based on extensive research in Jungian psychology and validation by personal development experts.
